trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.NodeMouseClick"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.NodeMouseDoubleClick"></xref> events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den metod som hanterar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.NodeMouseClick"> </xref> och <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.NodeMouseDoubleClick"> </xref> händelser i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you create a TreeNodeMouseClickEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar en TreeNodeMouseClickEventHandler delegat kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
